542790.name: RacetronicVR
542790.description:
Hovercar racing, laser shooting, fully motion controlled madness! RacetronicVR is a time trail racing game where you shoot obstacles and powerups, built exclusively for VR.

  • Steer with one hand and shoot with the other. VR racing as it should be: with motion controllers.
  • 3 galactic tracks with a bevy of obstacles, shortcuts, power ups and secrets keep the good times racing.
  • Local leader boards for track times, become the fastest racer in the galaxy.
  • Can cause VR motion sickness for some people, but hey, it's free :D

Thanks for playing, I hope you enjoy!
542790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
